title: Dashboard Web Principal
prompt: Create a main web dashboard for the 'Cierre de Cajas' system. This is a desktop screen that integrates the mobile modules into a wide layout. Features: 1. A sidebar navigation menu with icons for 'Dashboard', 'Movimientos', 'Gestión' (CRUDs), 'Informes', and 'Configuración'. 2. A top header with the app name, search bar, and user profile. 3. The main content area should display a summary dashboard with a large trend graph (income vs time), KPI cards (Total Recaudado, Total Tickets), and a recent activity list. Maintain the DARK theme, rounded cards, and neon green accents from the mobile screens. Use {{DATA:SCREEN:SCREEN_5}} as a reference for content. Theme: {{DATA:THEME:THEME_4}}.
name: projects/18266581404286886305/screens/dbbf10e47a0a461b906110e16b8882dd
